The '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a {{#show: {{PAGENAME}} |?ItemType}} of the type {{#show: {{PAGENAME}} |?ItemSubType}}. 

=Characteristics=
{{InfoOverview}}
 Top of the line for daggers found in the shop, the Catalina Blue knife is sharp as a razor, and durable enough to be hammered and bent at will. With an edge hard enough to scratch mid-grade quality steel, many warriors cherish the blade. Some models even feature a loop, capable of being strapped to a user's wrist to prevent being lost in combat.
